title: Torta Caprese
ingredients: 150g sugar (I prefer raw sugar, not white processed)
4 eggs (I prefer organic/free range, high quality eggs)
2 tablespoons of marsala (You may use Port if you cannot find marsala)
directions: Chop the chocolate very finely, I use a mini food processor on "chop"
Beat the butter and the sugar in a bowl until creamy. Â
Beat the eggs thoroughly in a separate bowl and add slowly while beating to the butter/sugar mixture.
Add the ground almonds and chopped chocolate, then stir in the baking powder and liqueur.
Place the mixture in a 24cm diameter springform cake tin greased with butter or lined with non-stick paper.
Bake in a preheated oven at 180 degrees C for about 43mins, a couple of mins less or more depending on your oven.
Turn the cake out onto a wire rack to cool, then snow with icing sugar...
serve with raspberries and marscapone if you so desire...
